name: ASIABITSToken

attributes.documentation: ERC20 events these generate a public event on the blockchain that will notify clients
attributes.name: Transfer

attributes.documentation:
Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
In our case, there's no initial supply. Tokens will be created as ether is sent
to the fall-back function. Then tokens are burned when ether is withdrawn.
attributes.name: ASIABITSToken

attributes.documentation: ERC-20 Approves and then calls the receiving contract
attributes.name: approveAndCall

attributes.documentation:
Fallback function when sending ether to the contract
Gas use: 65051
